items.sentence: I couldn\'t let Tom go without saying goodbye.
I couldn\'t tell Tom what was going to happen.
The ceremony will take place in the town hall.
We\'ll have to find some other way to do this.
We\'ll leave as soon as the weather clears up.
We\'ll never know what really happened to Tom.
I wonder why Tom thought we needed to do that.
Tom pulled out a bottle of wine and opened it.
Tom pushed the door open and entered the room.
Tom put a cup of coffee down in front of Mary.
